file_content.text: Status update.
Mando reinforcements heading Bey'wan's way.
Figured you'd be in the middle of the action. Anything to get the blood racing, right?
[Flirt] I can count on you.
You always get my blood racing. I look forward to fighting at your side.
Stay safe until I get there. I'll never forgive you if you get yourself killed.
One day we all must die, but that day is not today.
My students and I sought to defend the Gravestone. Enemy artillery slowed our progress.
I got this. Oggurobb gave me some toys to take out their big guns.
It's dangerous behind enemy lines, Vette. Watch your back.
Be careful out there.
Relax. They'll never even know I'm here.
If we hit the enemy forces from behind, we buy the Gravestone some time.
Why aren't you there already? Waiting for an invitation?
Took you long enough.
Had to clear our flank first. Blindly rushing into battle isn't brave. It's stupid.
Figured you'd be in the middle of the action.
Knew I could count on you.
This is what we live for. No way we're sitting this one out.
Bey'wan's forces were protecting the ship. What happened?
What about the Gravestone?
They're still holding, but they need all the help they can get.
Beautiful and resourceful. Just be careful. You're behind enemy lines.
[Flirt] Nice work, Vette.
Can't let you have all the fun. Save me a kiss for when this is all over.
Does Oggurobb have any other fancy gadgets we could use?
His toys could come in handy.
Everything was deployed with the troops. Now he's busy securing the base. Keeping the enemy away from his research.
Don't worry, though. I got everything I need to smash Vaylin's artillery.
Better there than the frontlines. At least this way you're not completely useless.
Try not to mess this up.
When those artillery guns are fried, you'll thank me!
